cause.description:
Simple!!! Revive the now defunct, dead genre of Grunge Rock!!
There are tons of new grunge bands out there that no one even knows about! And why? Because the world is filled with too many whorporate assholes!
And if I didn't start this cause...who the fuck would??
1. Grunge Rock Must Live Again!!
2. Long Live Left Handed Guitarists!!
3. Down With The Whorporation!!
cause.name: Grunge Rock Revival
